review: Great concept.  But every since I have plugged it in it has struggled.  IT does not respond well and blamed it on my network.  Well I tested my network and it is performing great. Very disappointed!
author: kadams05 "K.Adams"

review: After opening and plugging it in it would download the latest update, freeze 1/4 of the way through, tell me I can't update and try resettingI moved to another power outlet after googleing a bunch of suggested fix actions, now the update goes through, but after entering my correct account info I get "The information does not match an Amazon account. If Sign in Approval is enabled, please follow the instructions on your screenContacted Amazon, opened a case, turns out I was shipped a device, it was lost according to USPS, and they scheduled a replacement device shipmentthen the 1st device showed up, and in the system it was set to lost, and that is why it would not register, they said there are a few cases like thisthey turned it on so now its working great and I'm very happy, very speedy stick almost as good as my Fire TV (like 90% as good, VERY impressed at the price point)

author: Kristina Jackson

review: Still can't give it five stars because of the original headache, but the original headache was caused by the Netflix app. Deleted, then reinstalled the app and the fire stick is working fine. Kudos to Rolla at Amazon support.  The comments below are from my original post.Well, it worked for about 10 minutes, went to all the upgrades, worked perfectly well it was giving me the introductory video, and then about 10 minutes then the remote froze when I was trying to enter my Netflix ID and password.  Then it says it's not connected to the network, funny everything else in my house is connected. Went back and doublecheck my Wi-Fi and cable modem and everything's fine.I go and reset my login Wi-Fi and it shows very good strength, enter the password for the Wi-Fi and now it shows poor strength. My Wi-Fi and modemare approximately 15 feet from the stick.  Prior to this I was connecting to Netflix via my cheap Walmart DVD player, never had an issue. This thing is pathetic. I don't imagine Amazon will post this review.  if Amazon can fix this problem, I'll go back in and change my review, but will never give this thing five stars due to the initial problems.
author: Skippy

review: It skips, and stutters, and now we can't even get it to connect to wifi anymore. It's telling us it's the wrong password, it's not. Won't connect at all. I'm annoyed, and hope they have some type of update SOON.
